EmailTemplate.name: TSE: KubeCon Barcelona 05_20_19.002 KubeHunt - KubeHunt Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your KubeHunt Registration - Details for Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The hunt begins tomorrow! Below are some of the details:
- Meet us at Fira Gran Via, outside Hall 8, North Entrance: Check-in (look for two people wearing the KubeHunt t-shirts) to get your KubeHunt T, as well as Game Rules & Locations - Party Buses leave at 18:00 (6 PM): Donâ€™t forget - you are picking your own team of 3-5 and using the time on the bus to strategize your hunt.
- Food and drinks will be served at the reception, immediately following the KubeHunt starting at 20:00 hrs at the Ocana Club.
See you soon!
Cheers, Your KubeHunt Sponsors
P.S. If you have any questions, please contact asena.hertz@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:asena.hertz@turbonomic.com]]>
